Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''

- Parse actual STATUS from payload (parts[1])
- Fix latitude/longitude parsing (now parts[2] and parts[3])
- Store latest status per device in Map
- Add comprehensive error handling and logging
- This fixes NaN latitude error when receiver sends RYLR890|EMERGENCY|...

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix api/index.js to correctly parse multi-device payload format

CRITICAL FIX: This was causing 500 errors
- Parse DEVICE_ID from parts[0]
- Parse STATUS from parts[1]
- Parse latitude from parts[2] (was incorrectly using parts[1])
- Parse longitude from parts[3] (was incorrectly using parts[2])
- Store latest status per device in Map
- Add comprehensive error handling and logging

This fixes the scrambled data issue where:
- latitude was null
- longitude was correct by accident
- speed was showing longitude value
- satellites was showing speed value

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "Fix uptime/rssi/snr parsing to use parts[6] instead of parts[5]

CRITICAL FIX:
- parts[5] is satellites (e.g., ''6sat'')
- parts[6] contains ''uptime,rssi,snr'' (e.g., ''7013,-50,24'')
- Backend was incorrectly using parts[5] for uptime
- This caused uptime=''6sat'', rssi='''', snr=''''

Now correctly parses:
- uptime from parts[6].split('','')[0]
- rssi from parts[6].split('','')[1]  
- snr from parts[6].split('','')[2]

Fixes map display and data table issues.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>")

Bash(git commit -m "Add device ID parsing and multi-device support to root server.js

CRITICAL FIXES:
1. Parse deviceId from parts[0] (e.g., ''RYLR890'')
2. Parse actualStatus from parts[1] (not from request.body.status)
3. Add deviceId and deviceName to alertData for database
4. Add deviceId and deviceName to latestStatus for WebSocket
5. Update MongoDB schema to include deviceId and deviceName
6. Update loadLatestStatus to include deviceId when loading from DB
7. Fix condition to use actualStatus instead of status

This fixes:
- âœ… Table showing ''Unknown Device'' (now shows RYLR890)
- âœ… Map not showing pins (WebSocket now has deviceId + lat/lng)

Payload format: DEVICE_ID|STATUS|lat|lng|speed|sats|uptime,rssi,snr

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>")
